fants.fantText: Tie a towel over your head and dance to the song of Verka Serduchka
Name three movies starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. If you can name another two - get back the piece of clothing. If you can't name three, take off one piece of clothing.
Starting with the phrase "Never have I ever ...", name 5 things that you have never done.
Open the fridge - find, mix and eat two kinds of food with incompatible flavors. For example, strawberries and mushrooms, pickles and jam, sour cream and ketchup.
Grunt one verse of the song "Let the pedestrians run awkwardly through the puddles" without laughing.
Choose any player to draw a new card. You will carry out the task of the newly drawn together. The execution must be identical
